nts:with-parameter.name: scenarioDescription
nts:with-parameter.value: Verstrekking basale inhoud - andere elementen, alle subscenario's (Antwoord: bericht met 2 verstrekkingen)

nts:with-parameter.name: additionalDescription
nts:with-parameter.value: Known issue: the server responds with two extra MedicationDispense instances (with identifier values 'MBH_200_start_duur2_MVE_anderePRK' and 'MBH_200_toelichting_MVE_extra'), which are not available in the qualification scripts.
